title: Man jailed for parole violations after refusing to decrypt his Tor node
author: heavyset_go
aiHeadline: Man stubbornly refuses to decrypt his Tor node, gets jailed for his principles and an inability to cooperate with the FBI.

title: Shai-Hulud malware attack: Tinycolor and over 40 NPM packages compromised
author: jamesberthoty
aiHeadline: Hackers sneak into NPM packages, proving once again that even your favorite tools can turn against you.

title: Top UN legal investigators conclude Israel is guilty of genocide in Gaza
author: Qem
aiHeadline: UN investigators conclude Israel guilty of genocide, while the world debates whether to take action or just scroll past.

title: Things you can do with a Software Defined Radio (2024)

title: Waymo has received our pilot permit allowing for commercial operations at SFO
author: ChrisArchitect
aiHeadline: Waymo gets permit to operate at SFO, proving that the future of transportation is here, and it's autonomous... or is it just another step towards robot domination?
